DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate effectiveness tailor interactive online risk reduction program versus standard online risk reduction program reducing risk STD infection young adult .
DOC.brief_title: Effectiveness Online Prevention Program Reducing Risk STD Infection Young Adults
DOC.detailed_description: Adolescents young adult great risk acquire STD . Approximately 3 million people age 18 24 become infected year . Education risk consequence unprotected sex powerful tool use prevent reduce risk infection . The program study deliver message educate participant condom use risk STD infection . This study evaluate effectiveness tailor interactive online risk reduction program versus standard online risk reduction program reducing risk STD infection young adult . Participants 1-year open-label study recruit exclusively via internet . Participants randomly assign receive internet-based message either Youthnet program control program . Messages Youthnet program interactive tailor specifically HIV/STD risk reduction . The control program deliver standard STD/HIV prevention message . Participants assess baseline follow-up session 4 month enrollment . Frequency condom use attitude toward condom use assess use behavioral scale .
DOC.criteria: Has access internet Has email address Colorado resident
